Key Match Events: Ronel Blanco threw six scoreless innings.
Jason Heyward hit a home run among his three hits.
Josh Hader recorded his 31st save in 33 opportunities.
Taylor Ward hit a home run for the Angels.
Gustavo Campero had a run-scoring ground out in his major league debut.
Charles Leblanc had a two-run single.
Post-Match Reflections: Ronel Blanco reflected on his performance and improvements.
Jason Heyward expressed his satisfaction with being part of a team competing for the World Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Astros pitching coach Joshua Miller was ejected for arguing a hit-by-pitch call.
Astros OF Ben Gamel sustained a knee contusion.
Astros 1B Jon Singleton was a late scratch with an illness.
Angels OF Mickey Moniak was hit by a pitch and left the game.
An MRI on Angels RHP Ben Joyce revealed only inflammation.
Angels RHP Carson Fulmer was reinstated from the injured list.
Angels OF Bryce Teodosio and LHP Sam Aldegheri were placed on the IL.
